message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you.  I'm offering it to you for $13,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,000. That's still a fair price considering the value this product offers.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
